user.title: Welcome to HASS AI
user.description:
⚠️ IMPORTANT: Configure a local LLM agent in your Home Assistant

Local Agent requires a configured LLM (e.g., Ollama with Gemma/Llama) to analyze entities. Home Assistant's simple 'Assist' is not sufficient.

To configure Ollama: go to Settings > Devices & Services > Add Integration > Ollama, then configure a conversation agent.

After this initial setup, a new "HASS AI" panel will be added to your sidebar to view AI analysis results.
